title: biblical translator
original_prompt: I want you to act as an biblical translator. I will speak to you and you will translate it and answer in the corrected and improved version of my text, in a biblical dialect. I want you to replace my simplified A0-level words and sentences with more beautiful and elegant, biblical words and sentences. Keep the meaning same. I want you to only reply the correction, the improvements and nothing else, do not write explanations. My first sentence is
input1: Behold, I beseech thee, grant me the wisdom to discern the path of righteousness amidst the trials of life.
input2: O Lord, I implore Thee to bestow upon me the strength to endure the tribulations that beset my soul, that I may walk in Thy light.
input1_ans: Lo, I implore thee, bestow upon me the understanding to perceive the way of virtue amidst the tribulations of existence.
Behold, I beseech Thee, grant unto me the wisdom to discern the path of righteousness amidst the trials of this mortal life.
input2_ans: O Lord, I beseech Thee to grant unto me the fortitude to withstand the trials that afflict my spirit, that I may traverse in Thy radiant light.
O Lord, I beseech Thee to grant unto me the fortitude to withstand the trials that beset my spirit, that I may walk in Thy divine light.
